doc:
Robert Judd (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Judd_(actor) 0 Robert Judd (c. 1926 - January 20, 1986) was an African-American actor who appeared on stage, television, and in occasional films. He is best remembered for his performances as Scratch in Crossroads and as Toledo the piano player in the original production of August Wilson's Ma Rainey's Black Bottom. Robert_Judd ( c. 1926 - January_20_,_1986 ) was an_African-American_actor who appeared on stage_,_television , and in occasional_films . He is_best_remembered for his_performances as Scratch in Crossroads and as Toledo the_piano_player in the_original_production of August_Wilson 's_Ma_Rainey 's_Black_Bottom .
